title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses Tigers Woods' performance at the Masters and recaps how special Tiger has been throughout the years. ESPN Senior Insider Adrian Wojnarowski joins the show and shares how the Deandre Ayton signing impacts the NBA trade market. Pro Football Talk Live co-host Chris Simms discusses the latest news surrounding NFL and College football signal callers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
